About Me

BIO

Hello! I am Luke, a passionate software engineering student at General Assembly. I am based in Sydney and enjoy building things that live on your electronic devices ♥.

I have over 8 years experience in both engineering drafting and graphic design, so I thought why not combined these skills gained from both roles to create great applications!

Here's a few things I'm experienced with:

  • JavaScript
  • HTML & CSS
  • SASS
  • React
  • Node.js
  • Ruby
  • SQL
  • MogoDB
  • Adobe Illustrator
  • SolidWorks
